content: > grab the free pattern from my website > or purchase the ad-free pdf right here > on ravelry stay organized with the makers convertible basket bag pattern this versatile crochet pattern can be used as a small project basket or a travel-friendly project bag featuring a sturdy canvas inner bag with pockets for hooks scissors and stitch markers plus a drawstring closure to keep everything secure it s perfect for crocheting on the go make it unique with your favorite colors and enjoy crafting in style > this pattern is available for free on > my website which is monetized by ads > if you prefer an ad-free version of > the pattern it is available to > purchase from my pattern shop ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2025 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
